8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Zaid bin Khalid Al-Juhani narrated that:The Messenger of Allah said: "Whoever provides the food for a fasting person to break his fast with, then for him is the same reward as his (the fasting person's), without anything being diminished from the reward of the fasting person

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ مَنْ فَطَّرَ صَائِمًا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Revealed About One Who Provides The Food For A Fasting Person To Break His Fast
